verses.verse: And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from the <S%H4480>wilderness<s%> <S%H4057><s%> of <S%H5512>Sin,<s%> after their <S%H4550>journeys,<s%> according <S%H5921>to<s%> the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in <S%H7508>Rephidim:<s%> and there was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> for the <S%H5971>people<s%> to <S%H8354>drink.<s%>

Wherefore the <S%H5971>people<s%> did <S%H7378>chide<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5414>Give<s%> us <S%H4325>water<s%> that we may <S%H8354>drink.<s%> And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, <S%H4100>Why<s%> <S%H7378>chide<s%> ye <S%H5978>with<s%> me? <S%H4100>wherefore<s%> do ye <S%H5254>tempt<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD?<s%>

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H6770>thirsted<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> for <S%H4325>water;<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3885>murmured<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>Wherefore<s%> is <S%H2088>this<s%> that thou hast brought us <S%H5927>up<s%> out of <S%H4480>Egypt,<s%> <S%H4714><s%> to <S%H4191>kill<s%> us and our <S%H1121>children<s%> and our <S%H4735>cattle<s%> with <S%H6772>thirst?<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6817>cried<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> shall I <S%H6213>do<s%> unto <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people?<s%> they be <S%H4592>almost<s%> <S%H5750>ready<s%> to <S%H5619>stone<s%> me.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> Go <S%H5674>on<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> thee of the <S%H4480>elders<s%> <S%H2205><s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and thy <S%H4294>rod,<s%> <S%H834>wherewith<s%> thou <S%H5221>smotest<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2975>river,<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> in thine <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H1980>go.<s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I will <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H6697>rock<s%> in <S%H2722>Horeb;<s%> and thou shalt <S%H5221>smite<s%> the <S%H6697>rock,<s%> and there shall <S%H3318>come<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> it, that the <S%H5971>people<s%> may <S%H8354>drink.<s%> And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And he <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H4532>Massah,<s%> and <S%H4809>Meribah,<s%> because <S%H5921>of<s%> the <S%H7379>chiding<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H5921>because<s%> they <S%H5254>tempted<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3426>Is<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> us, <S%H518>or<s%> <S%H369>not?<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> Choose us <S%H977>out<s%> <S%H376>men,<s%> and go <S%H3318>out,<s%> <S%H3898>fight<s%> with <S%H6002>Amalek:<s%> <S%H4279>tomorrow<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> will <S%H5324>stand<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H1389>hill<s%> with the <S%H4294>rod<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> in mine <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

So <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> had <S%H559>said<s%> to him, and <S%H3898>fought<s%> with <S%H6002>Amalek:<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and <S%H2354>Hur<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> to the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H1389>hill.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> held <S%H7311>up<s%> his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> that <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1396>prevailed:<s%> and <S%H834>when<s%> he let <S%H5117>down<s%> his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> <S%H6002>Amalek<s%> <S%H1396>prevailed.<s%>

But <S%H4872>Moses'<s%> <S%H3027>hands<s%> were <S%H3515>heavy;<s%> and they <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H68>stone,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> it <S%H8478>under<s%> him, and he <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H5921>thereon;<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and <S%H2354>Hur<s%> stayed <S%H8551>up<s%> his <S%H3027>hands,<s%> the <S%H259>one<s%> on the one <S%H4480>side,<s%> <S%H2088><s%> and the <S%H259>other<s%> on the other <S%H4480>side;<s%> <S%H2088><s%> and his <S%H3027>hands<s%> <S%H1961>were<s%> <S%H530>steady<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the going <S%H935>down<s%> of the <S%H8121>sun.<s%>
And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H2522>discomfited<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H6002>Amalek<s%> and his <S%H5971>people<s%> with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H3789>Write<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> for a <S%H2146>memorial<s%> in a <S%H5612>book,<s%> and <S%H7760>rehearse<s%> it in the <S%H241>ears<s%> of <S%H3091>Joshua:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> I will utterly put <S%H4229>out<s%> <S%H4229><s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2143>remembrance<s%> of <S%H6002>Amalek<s%> from <S%H4480>under<s%> <S%H8478><s%> <S%H8064>heaven.<s%>
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> an <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of it Jehovah-nissi: <S%H3071><s%>

For he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> the <S%H3050>LORD<s%> hath <S%H3027>sworn<s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3676><s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will have <S%H4421>war<s%> with <S%H6002>Amalek<s%> from <S%H4480>generation<s%> <S%H1755><s%> to <S%H1755>generation.<s%>
